OOC: Are one of Brotherhood's Gelstal, KLawdogg, around ?

Alecto/Kali/Perceptor/Underground/Charon/Deepfear/Sharpclaws/Attillah

Alecto landed and looked that she was wounded, but she could 
continued the fight and she cursed and shot against DemonWulf; Kalin 
landed and when she commented about Alecto's wounds, the savage femme 
shouted "Fight, you fool, and later you can act like a nurse!!!!" ; 
after that she shot against Demon wulf.

Perceptor open fire against Imprisioner.

Underground, Charon, Depfear, Sharpclaws and Attilla arrived and were 
looking for a target.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> Alecto/Kali:
>  
> Alecto and Kali avoided DemonWulf's attack in the last moment and 
the 
> femme shot 25 times agaisnt him
> 
> Luzbel::
> 
> Luzbel used his fire-laucher to destroy the missile, and said "I've 
> seen a lot fools in my life, but you are the dumpest of all!!!" and 
> he shot 25 times with his laser machine-gun agaisnt Dark Claw. The 
> trasmetal dragon-bot, saw the Ion disk and destroy them with his 
fire-
> laucher,  and said to Manterror "At whom are you calling "Maximal", 
> you matallic-junk???? We're here for a personal Venddetta not for 
> helps MAximals... For that Insult You WILL DIE!!!"
> 
> Luzbel Lauched two missiles agains Manterror. 
> 
> 
> Darkfate::
> 
> Darkfate took off avoiding Imprisioner's shot, and he shot his 
> megablaster against Imprisioner, that movement did that Darkfate 
> avoided Vehemet's attack .The four snake-like heads started to  
move 
> and shot their hidden weapons against Vehemet.
> 
> (OOC: if that is moding, ignore the snake-like head's attack )
> 
> 
> Shivah::
> 
> Shivah transformed quickly in his beast mode (Trasmetal three head-
> dragon) with his three heads heads, the dragon lauched fire, 
> destroying the missiles. After Missiles were destroyed, Shivah, 
> transformed in robot mode and shot his balster against  Injector..
